qas.question: Who wrote War on the Floor: An Average Guy Plays in the Arena Football League and Lives to Write About It?
In what year was War on the Floor released?
What team did Jeff Foley play for?
How many games did Jeff Foley play in?
Along with 1999, in what preseason did Foley play for the Firebirds?

context: In <a1_0>2001<a1_0/>, <a0_0>Jeff Foley<a0_0/> published War on the Floor: An Average Guy Plays in the Arena Football League and Lives to Write About It. The book details a journalist's two preseasons (1999 and <a4_0>2000<a4_0/>) as an offensive specialist/writer with the now-defunct <a2_0>Albany Firebirds<a2_0/>. The 5-foot-6 (170 cm), self-described "unathletic writer" played in <a3_0>three<a3_0/> preseason games and had one catch for −2 yards.
